question: UFC 274: Who will win - Charles Oliveira or Justin Gaethje?
description:
UFC 274 is an upcoming mixed martial arts event produced by the Ultimate Fighting Championship that will take place on May 7, 2022, at the Footprint Center in Phoenix, Arizona, United States.

This is a market on whether Charles Oliveira or Justin Gaethje will win their lightweight title bout.

If Charles Oliveira is declared the winner of this bout, this market will resolve to “Oliveira”. 
If Justin Gaethje is declared the winner of this bout, this market will resolve to “Gaethje”.

If this fight is declared a draw, or if for any reason the match is not scored, postponed after May 15 or cancelled, this market will resolve 50-50.
